amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds in the bill from being used for meteorological equipment at Valparaiso University in Valparaiso, Indiana.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the $720,000 appropriation in the bill for meteorological equipment at Valparaiso University in Valparaiso, Indiana.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A038) Failed by voice vote.
